divs: Sighting Detailsi was riding along with my sister, in the truck, and i fell asleep for a fewminutes, and i sensed i was being watched, when i opend my eyes, there was avery, very bright light, directly ahead in the sky. it looked just like the sunbut only the size of a star, moving south and in an upward path, it was movingfaster than a jet linner, about a minute to a minute an a half it was gone.itcould be a plane, or it may be something elese, i just dont know what it was
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Big Rapids
There were no other sightings in Big Rapids on or around July 1st 2001
Summary: small very bright light moving at very high speed
